name: General
description: unique location on private road overlooking countryside. detailed planning currently approved for exclusive 1850 sq/ft dwelling. the site has its permitted development in tact allowing for initial extension up to 2400 sq/ft. all services on site. application can be viewed on coventry council planning portal ref: rm/2021/3791
features: Oak veneer doors with polished chrome
Fibre broadband to premises for home working
CAT 5 cabling for secure networks to lounge and bedrooms
Large storage area in loft space

name: Bathroom
description: The Bathroom is a serene oasis within your home. Porcelain tiling and LED feature lighting create a calming atmosphere. The Hansgrohe tops and wall-hung sanitary wear provide both style and functionality. Soft towels and complimentary toiletries are thoughtfully provided for your convenience.

name: Garden/ Patio
description: The Externals feature a range of amenities designed to enhance your living experience. An outside tap provides convenience, and a security alarm system ensures peace of mind. The property also offers a 3kw charging point with provisions for 7kw, ensuring you're prepared for the future of electric vehicles. Additionally, the rear outside lights, porch lantern, and dusk-to-dawn lantern provide both practicality and an inviting ambiance to the exterior of your home.
